Method Detail

getEntityInstanceById

public Entity getEntityInstanceById(int type,
                                    double x,
                                    double y)
Description copied from class: Mod
Called whenever an entity is spawned. It cycles through loaded mods, and until it is returned an entity. Use it in conjunction with the i value and registering entities so that @code{ if(i==myEntityId)return new MyEntity(i,x,y); }

Overrides:
getEntityInstanceById in class Mod
Parameters:
type - The id of the Entity to spawn
x - The x location of the new Entity to Spawn
y - the y location of the new Entity to Spawn
Returns:
A new instance of your registered entity

getVersion

public java.lang.String getVersion()
Specified by:
getVersion in class Mod
Returns:
The mod version
